data.Name: LOONA
data.Bio: Multiple Artists exist with the name Loona: 1) LOONA, stylized as LOOΠΔ (Hangul: 이달의 소녀; lit. Girl of the Month) is a 12-member South Korean girl group under BlockBerryCreative, a subsidiary of Polaris Entertainment. The group has been garnering attention since September 2016 and is considered one of the most ambitious and large-scale projects in the history of K-Pop. Each individual member released a single album up until the group's official debut. Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: LOONA
data.Description: The 12-member girl group made a strong impression on international fans with their 3rd mini-album Midnight (12:00) charting on the Billboard 200, along with their previous mini-album # topping the iTunes charts in 56 countries around the world. Carrying their momentum through to this year with phenomenal performances on the Mnet variety show Queendom 2, and a successful offline concert [LOONAVERSE : FROM] in Seoul, South Korea for the first time in 3 years, LOONA is ready to showcase their talents on a global scale. Following their Seoul show, LOONA takes off in the 2022 LOONA 1st World Tour : [LOONATHEWORLD] to celebrate with their fans worldwide. All ages welcome. Doors: 6:00PM Show: 7:30PM *Support acts subject to change without notice.
